title: El Malpais National Monument: Volunteer
body: Volunteer       Interested in learning more about El Malpais National Monument? Spend some time with us as a volunteer! Staff the front desk, help with bird surveys, work on wilderness management plans, or assist with archaeology. You can earn an annual parks pass good for a year if you serve 250 hours!  For more information contact the volunteer coordinator by email or call us at 505-285-4641 x18.  Â     Current Volunteer Opportunities
